page.title: 05Calne Music Festival.
page.content: The President of this annual festival is sculptor Sean Crampton. There are exibitions of painting,crafts,sculpture and photography by artists from Calne and surrounding villages. The Performers:Sine Nomine,a Chamber String Orchestra,and Calne Amateur Theatrical Society have recently been formed. There is busking in the streets, recitals,garden parties,concerts and puppet shows.We have a schools Music Workshop when children rehearse for one day and give a public performance the same evening. In 1985 pupils of John Bentley school,calling themselves Sahel gave a performance of their own musical work in the Baptist Chapel at the Festival opening Service.
